# Module: tf.contrib.util

Utilities for dealing with Tensors.



Defined in [`contrib/util/__init__.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/contrib/util/__init__.py).

<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


## Modules

[`loader`](../../tf/contrib/util/loader) module: Utilities for loading op libraries.

## Functions

[`constant_value(...)`](../../tf/get_static_value): Returns the constant value of the given tensor, if efficiently calculable.

[`make_ndarray(...)`](../../tf/make_ndarray): Create a numpy ndarray from a tensor.

[`make_tensor_proto(...)`](../../tf/make_tensor_proto): Create a TensorProto.

[`ops_used_by_graph_def(...)`](../../tf/contrib/util/ops_used_by_graph_def): Collect the list of ops used by a graph.

[`stripped_op_list_for_graph(...)`](../../tf/contrib/util/stripped_op_list_for_graph): Collect the stripped OpDefs for ops used by a graph.
